doc.field: Records of the Office of the Chancellor/Executive Vice President (Sidney Borowitz)
Records of the Office of the Chancellor/Executive Vice President (Sidney Borowitz)

This series comprises 1.25 linear feet and is structured to reflect several major aspects of the portfolio of the Senior Vice President for External Affairs, namely: Alumni Affairs; the Bicentennial Committee; Development, including donor solicitation and acknowledgment correspondence and foundation relations; the NYU Press; and the Office of the Senior Vice President.

Notable materials include meeting minutes of the NYU Committee on the (United States) Bicentennial, Box 23, folders 3-4, a draft development campaign mission statement, "A View of Our Responsibilities and Our Opportunities," 3/7/73, Box 23, folder 5, NYU's proposal to the Ford Foundation for an Emergency Fund Grant to support reorganization and retrenchment programs, 7/5/72, and its undated final narrative report, 11/75? Box 24, folders 2-3, Borowitz on the role of a university press, 11/9/76, Box 25, folders 1,4, NYU Press Statement of Purpose, 3/19/76, Box 25, folder 4.
Records of the Office of the Chancellor/Executive Vice President (Sidney Borowitz)
